elements.text: It's a hot summer day, and you are mowing the lawn. You take a break and are surprised to notice that you are shaky. You think that your blood sugar must have dropped, so you find a snack that is...

elements.name: Mowing the Lawn_Presymptomatic_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
